data.title: Davey Detail – All About Rose McGowan’s Former Husband
data.meta_description: Marriages are made to last a lifetime. People are meant to live happily ever after and enjoy each other's company after they tie the knot. While this
data.text:
Marriages are made to last a lifetime. People are meant to live happily ever after and enjoy each other’s company after they tie the knot. While this really works for most people, it doesn’t always work for others, especially celebrities. In the case of Davey Detail and Rose McGowan, the two managed to follow each other for three years before their marriage escalated into divorce.

For Rose, her relationship with Detail was not her first, she had many relationships with the likes of Marilyn Manson, Texas-born filmmaker Robert Rodriguez and musician Jordy Asher. Although McGowan’s ex-husband kept a low profile after their tragic divorce, here’s everything you need to know about him.

Davey Detail Bio

Davey Detail came into the world on the 12th day of January 1983. He was born in Bellevue, Washington, United States, but information about his parents, siblings, childhood and family relationships does not are not really accessible to the public.

Likewise, the names of the institutions he attended for his primary, secondary and college education are also not known to the public. However, he is said to have developed a fondness for art and design from an early age. During his studies, Davey participated in art and design competitions and his works were quite impressive.

All About Rose McGowan’s Former Husband

1. His real name

In and out of the industry, Rose McGowan’s ex-husband is known as Davey Detail, but few know his real name is Davey Leavitt. Davey Detail is just a nickname adopted by the artist for his company.

2. Davey Detail is an accomplished visual artist

Davey Detail is an incredible visual artist renowned for his involvement in the Los Angeles art collective CYRCLE which he co-founded with two other artists: Devin Liston and David Torres in 2010. The collective gained immense popularity from the first times after an April Fools joke was installed on a fence at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles during a street art concert. Soon after, their works began to appear in group shows at local galleries in Los Angeles.

CYRCLE which paints a clear picture of men’s sensitive nature and duality via aesthetic form and balance has been a commercial success for many years. Besides the fact that the trio has already performed a unique show called: CYRCLE Manifesto, many celebrities also own CYRCLE’s art in their personal collections.

Among them are Ari Emanuel, Shepard Fairey and Sean John Combs, a New York-born rapper known professionally as P. Diddy. Known for his fine art, muralism, typography, sculpture and installation technique, pieces from CYRCLE’s collection have also featured in advertisements, including that of Rose McGowan’s former husband for Audi. CYRCLE’s first solo exhibition opened in August 2011 with the subtitle: WE NEVER DIE (WND).

3. His marriage to Rose McGowan

The couple exchanged their wedding vows on October 12, 2013. The ceremony took place at the Paramour Mansion in Silverlake, California, under the presidency of a rabbi (Detail is Jewish). It’s unclear exactly when and what Rose and Detail met or started their relationship, but we do know there were other men the actress dated before she said ‘yes’ to the plastic artist.

She was in a relationship with Marilyn Manson for nearly four years after which they got engaged but infamously broke off their relationship in 2001. Rose was also engaged to Robert Rodriquez from October 2007 to October 2009 before having a brief fling with the musician Jordy Asher.

4. Davey’s Divorce by Rose McGowan

Rose and her husband filed for divorce in February 2016, two years after they got married. In their divorce papers, the two mentioned irreconcilable differences as the main reason for their separation and also revealed that they had separated a year before filing for divorce.

It was also reported that Davey Detail and McGown had reached a private agreement regarding the division of their assets and refused to accept child support. Their union produced no children.

5. He is currently based in Los Angeles

Although Davey Detail is originally from Bellevue, Washington, he currently resides in Los Angeles, where he runs his visual art business.

6. his height

The Bellevue artist, who is from Washington, is 5 feet 10 inches tall and weighs 74 kg. Information on his other measurements is not available at this time.
